name: Lava Rising 2.0
description:
WASD to move Shift to Run

This is a more polished version of the game I made for the Mini Jam 52: Summit

Code and Most art done by Ivan Martin(me)

Music and player done by Joaquin Vintamilla

Background is an asset from this tile set:

https://opengameart.org/content/metroidvania-tileset-v2
